summary: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.
cast: Robert Urich|Mary Crosby|Michael D. Roberts|Anjelica Huston|John Matuszak|Ron Perlman|John Carradine|Natalie Core|Jeremy West|Bruce Vilanch|Alan Caillou|Marcia Lewis|Daryl Keith Roach|Robert Symonds|Gary Brockette|Rockne Tarkington|Ian Abercrombie|Dolores Albin|Hank Worden|Bonnie Campbell-Britton|Carmen Filpi|John Gillespie|Patty Maloney|Shane McCamey|Ralph Meyering Jr.|Myron Natwick|Raymond Skipp|Debra Troyer|Diana Webster|Richard Young|Sander Johnson|Steffen Zacharias|Lloyd Gordon|Marian Green|Jean Malahni|Ira S. Rosenstein|Ron Taylor|Max von Sydow
title: Guerreros del espacio
